text: Jawed Karim (born October 28, 1979) is a German-Bangladeshi software engineer and Internet entrepreneur. He has a Bangladeshi descent from his paternal side and a German descent from his maternal side. He is a co-founder of YouTube. He is also the first person to upload a video to the site. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:American software engineers
title: Jawed Karim
